117315.「ここから北東の 風車の丘に\n キラキラ大風車塔いう 塔あるよ。\n<br>\:
There is a tower called Glitter Windmill Tower on Windmill Way northeast of here. There is a hill called Orpha Hill in Orphea Region West,
further east from Windmill Way. There is a settlement called Wilderness Retreat in Choppi Wilderness, southeast of here. If you have
never been there, you should go there.
